quickSteps: Open the pair ETH→XMR on ETZ Swap and review the quote.
Update ETH/XMR wallets, back up seeds, and generate a fresh XMR receiving address.
Choose rate type: Fixed (exact amount) or Floating (tighter spreads).
Send a small ETH test transaction; confirm XMR arrival and payout behavior.
Send the main ETH amount within the time window; verify incoming XMR.

seo.title: Swap ETH to XMR: Private, Fungible Payments
seo.description: Practical ETH→XMR guide: privacy, fungibility, execution tips, costs, and pitfalls to avoid.
